content: *i cast on this shawl on my wedding day - really wanted to make a special design to share my joy with ravelry knitters * crescent all over lace shawl 1156 beads - 90gr of size 6 **charts only no row by row written description included ** > soli deo gloria kal 1 please use tag **sdgkal** **errata ** chart 8 has 9 repeats not 8 here s a link to stitch count sheet 2 made by awesome spockie 3 thank you rebecca 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/by-the-lily-pond/3181128/1-25 2 https //docs google com/spreadsheets/d/1nws3glsrwc9hxbuse6d9wodqps4gilakvtp8r3hwtgg/edit usp=sharing 3 http //www ravelry com/people/spockie
